Package com.attivio.sdk.server.annotation

Annotation Type ScannerInfo

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target({METHOD,TYPE})
@Inherited
public @interface ScannerInfo

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      boolean aieAdminOnly

      java.lang.Class<?> defaultFeederClass

      Fields populated by the connector
      java.lang.String suggestedWorkflow

      boolean supportsActiveSecurity  
      boolean supportsMetadataOnly

      boolean supportsTestMode
